Waco.Oakwood Cemetery (Waco, Texas):
Oakwood Cemetery is a 157-acre (64 ha) cemetery in Waco, Texas, in which three governors of Texas are buried.


== History ==
Founded in 1878, to relieve crowded conditions at Waco's main, First Street Cemetery, the cemetery was built on the site of an abandoned horse racing track.
Many interred remains from other early local graveyards were moved here because of the better maintenance of these grounds.
